Text: The Hork-Bajir Chronicles is the second companion book to the "Animorphs" series, written by K. A. Applegate.
Triplets:<The Hork-Bajir Chronicles
2:
--------------------
Text: The Hork-Bajir Chronicles:  The book is introduced by Tobias, who flies to the valley of the free Hork-Bajir, where Jara Hamee tells him the story of how the Yeerks enslaved the Hork-Bajir, and how Aldrea, an Andalite, and her companion, Dak Hamee, a Hork-Bajir, tried to save their world from the invasion.
